H0.text: A Colles fracture is in which part of the body. Ankle

H1.text: A Colles fracture is in which part of the body. Elbow

H2.text: A Colles fracture is in which part of the body. Shoulder

H3.text: A Colles fracture is in which part of the body. Wrist

A4.text: A Colles' fracture is a type of fracture of the distal forearm in which the broken end of the radius is bent backwards.

A5.text: It typically occurs as a result of a fall on an outstretched hand.
